hero_desc: My name is Carlos Ramos, but my friends call me Capi. I started programming with an IBM in school when I was 8 years old. Currently, I'm a trained Full Stack MERN developer.

services_items.title: Frontend Development
services_items.desc: I build modern and responsive interfaces with React, CSS and smooth animations.

services_items.title: UX/UI Design
services_items.desc: I design clean and engaging user experiences, optimized for real users.

services_items.title: Backend & APIs
services_items.desc: I develop secure REST APIs with Node.js, Express and SQL/NoSQL databases.

resume_experience_items.title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
resume_experience_items.description: Together with my team and Data Science, we developed a platform with a dashboard and calendar for startups in Valencia, improving UX and reducing load times by 30%.

resume_experience_items.title: Backend Developer
resume_experience_items.description: Developed Node.js microservices and managed PostgreSQL databases, optimizing queries and system performance.

resume_experience_items.title: Junior Developer
resume_experience_items.description: I designed UI components in React and helped fix bugs to improve the application's stability.

resume_experience_items.title: Systems Administrator
resume_experience_items.description: I provided support for the university's equipment, as well as repaired, updated, and created local networks for students.

resume_experience_items.title: Systems Administrator
resume_experience_items.description: I provided support for police computer systems, created a local cloud-based storage system for them, and reinforced security to prevent intrusions.
